version.author: Meo Mespotine
version.changelog:
- 25th of September 2023 - Razor Edit actions for enhancing edges of a razor area to the next/previous transient of an item under mouse.
- 25th of September 2023 - Razor Edit actions for snapping edges of a razor-area to edges of an item.
- 24th of September 2023 - Razor-Edit actions for nudging, removing razor areas, filling gaps and creating razor edits from time selection, all under the mouse.
- 24th of September 2023 - Quick Zoom - toggles between two zoomstates: 1. close to the project and 2. the last used zoom-factor
- 24th of September 2023 - Show Takename as tooltip near mouse - fixed bugs whith midi/empty items crashing the script. Shows now also Takename AND Sourcefilename.
- 23rd of September 2023 - Show takename as tooltip near mouse - shows name of the take the mouse is currently hovering above as tooltip near the mouse
- 23rd of September 2023 - Marker Selector v1.1 added, which allows you to quickly type any marker number and Reaper will jump to it. Install it via "Mespotine_Marker_Selector_Setup.lua". After setup, you can type any marker number you like. The commit time between having typed the marker and Reaper jumping to the marker can be set up with "Mespotine_Marker_Selector_SetWaitTime.lua".

metadata.description: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1031{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue255;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2510;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\lang7\b\f0\fs22 Mespotine Scripts and Extensions\par \par This is a collection of scripts and extensions written by Meo-Ada Mespotine.\par Most of the scripts are usable directly. Scripts who belong together as one feature have the same name at the beginning.(like Marker Selector)\par Some features need setup. In that case, look for the words "mespotine" "setup" in the actionlist. Doubleclick the action and go through the setup process.\par For instance:\par There's a feature called "Marker Selector" which allows you to quickly type the marker number and Reaper will jump to it(any marker number, actually).\par This will be setup by "Script: Mespotine_Marker_Selector_Setup.lua" in the actionlist.\par After having installed it, you can type any number and Reaper will go the the corresponding marker. All related scripts have "Mespotine_Marker_Selector" at the beginning of their name.\par \par All scripts are licensed under MIT-license, unless otherwise noted(usually in the scripts themselves).\par \par Have fun.\par \par Meo-Ada Mespotine - 23rd of october 2023 - mespotine.de\par Donations are welcome - {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://mespotin.uber.space/Mespotine/mespotine-unterstuetzen/"}}{\fldrslt{\ul\cf1 https://mespotin.uber.space/Mespotine/mespotine-unterstuetzen/}}}\b0\f0\fs22\par }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1031{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Calibri;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue255;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2510;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\sa200\sl276\slmult1\lang7\b\f0\fs22 Mespotine Scripts and Extensions\par \par This is a collection of scripts and extensions written by Meo-Ada Mespotine.\par Most of the scripts are usable directly. Scripts who belong together as one feature have the same name at the beginning.(like Marker Selector)\par Some features need setup. In that case, look for the words "mespotine" "setup" in the actionlist. Doubleclick the action and go through the setup process.\par For instance:\par There's a feature called "Marker Selector" which allows you to quickly type the marker number and Reaper will jump to it(any marker number, actually).\par This will be setup by "Script: Mespotine_Marker_Selector_Setup.lua" in the actionlist.\par After having installed it, you can type any number and Reaper will go the the corresponding marker. All related scripts have "Mespotine_Marker_Selector" at the beginning of their name.\par \par All scripts are licensed under MIT-license, unless otherwise noted(usually in the scripts themselves).\par \par Have fun.\par \par Meo-Ada Mespotine - 23rd of october 2023 - mespotine.de\par Donations are welcome - {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://mespotin.uber.space/Mespotine/mespotine-unterstuetzen/"}}{\fldrslt{\ul\cf1 https://mespotin.uber.space/Mespotine/mespotine-unterstuetzen/}}}\b0\f0\fs22\par }
